title: 旧约 - 创世记(Genesis) - 第 5 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 创世记(Genesis) -- 第 5 章 ( 本篇共有 50 章 )

lineList.en: This is the book of the generations of Adam. In the day that God created man, in the likeness of God made he him;
lineList.cn: 亚当的后代记在下面。当神造人的日子，是照着自己的样式造的。

lineList.en: Male and female created he them; and blessed them, and called their name Adam, in the day when they were created.
lineList.cn: 并且造男造女。在他们被造的日子，神赐福给他们，称他们为人。

lineList.en: And Adam lived an hundred and thirty years, and begat a son in his own likeness, after his image; and called his name Seth:
lineList.cn: 亚当活到一百三十岁，生了一个儿子，形像样式和自己相似，就给他起名叫塞特。

lineList.en: And the days of Adam after he had begotten Seth were eight hundred years: and he begat sons and daughters:
lineList.cn: 亚当生塞特之后，又在世八百年，并且生儿养女。

lineList.en: And all the days that Adam lived were nine hundred and thirty years: and he died.
lineList.cn: 亚当共活了九百三十岁就死了。

lineList.en: And Seth lived an hundred and five years, and begat Enos:
lineList.cn: 塞特活到一百零五岁，生了以挪士。

lineList.en: And Seth lived after he begat Enos eight hundred and seven years, and begat sons and daughters:
lineList.cn: 塞特生以挪士之后，又活了八百零七年，并且生儿养女。

lineList.en: And all the days of Seth were nine hundred and twelve years: and he died.
lineList.cn: 塞特共活了九百一十二岁就死了。

lineList.en: And Enos lived ninety years, and begat Cainan:
lineList.cn: 以挪士活到九十岁，生了该南。

lineList.en: And Enos lived after he begat Cainan eight hundred and fifteen years, and begat sons and daughters:
lineList.cn: 以挪士生该南之后，又活了八百一十五年，并且生儿养女。

lineList.en: And all the days of Enos were nine hundred and five years: and he died.
lineList.cn: 以挪士共活了九百零五岁就死了。

lineList.en: And Cainan lived seventy years, and begat Mahalaleel:
lineList.cn: 该南活到七十岁，生了玛勒列。

lineList.en: And Cainan lived after he begat Mahalaleel eight hundred and forty years, and begat sons and daughters:
lineList.cn: 该南生玛勒列之后，又活了八百四十年，并且生儿养女。

lineList.en: And all the days of Cainan were nine hundred and ten years: and he died.
lineList.cn: 该南共活了九百一十岁就死了。

lineList.en: And Mahalaleel lived sixty and five years, and begat Jared:
lineList.cn: 玛勒列活到六十五岁，生了雅列。

lineList.en: And Mahalaleel lived after he begat Jared eight hundred and thirty years, and begat sons and daughters:
lineList.cn: 玛勒列生雅列之后，又活了八百三十年，并且生儿养女。

lineList.en: And all the days of Mahalaleel were eight hundred ninety and five years: and he died.
lineList.cn: 玛勒列共活了八百九十五岁就死了。

lineList.en: And Jared lived an hundred sixty and two years, and he begat Enoch:
lineList.cn: 雅列活到一百六十二岁，生了以诺。

lineList.en: And Jared lived after he begat Enoch eight hundred years, and begat sons and daughters:
lineList.cn: 雅列生以诺之后，又活了八百年，并且生儿养女。

lineList.en: And all the days of Jared were nine hundred sixty and two years: and he died.
lineList.cn: 雅列共活了九百六十二岁就死了。

lineList.en: And Enoch lived sixty and five years, and begat Methuselah:
lineList.cn: 以诺活到六十五岁，生了玛土撒拉。

lineList.en: And Enoch walked with God after he begat Methuselah three hundred years, and begat sons and daughters:
lineList.cn: 以诺生玛土撒拉之后，与神同行三百年，并且生儿养女。

lineList.en: And all the days of Enoch were three hundred sixty and five years:
lineList.cn: 以诺共活了三百六十五岁。

lineList.en: And Enoch walked with God: and he was not; for God took him.
lineList.cn: 以诺与神同行，神将他取去，他就不在世了。

lineList.en: And Methuselah lived an hundred eighty and seven years, and begat Lamech:
lineList.cn: 玛土撒拉活到一百八十七岁，生了拉麦。

lineList.en: And Methuselah lived after he begat Lamech seven hundred eighty and two years, and begat sons and daughters:
lineList.cn: 玛土撒拉生拉麦之后，又活了七百八十二年，并且生儿养女。

lineList.en: And all the days of Methuselah were nine hundred sixty and nine years: and he died.
lineList.cn: 玛土撒拉共活了九百六十九岁就死了。

lineList.en: And Lamech lived an hundred eighty and two years, and begat a son:
lineList.cn: 拉麦活到一百八十二岁，生了一个儿子，

lineList.en: And he called his name Noah, saying, This same shall comfort us concerning our work and toil of our hands, because of the ground which the LORD hath cursed.
lineList.cn: 给他起名叫挪亚，说，这个儿子必为我们的操作和手中的劳苦安慰我们。这操作劳苦是因为耶和华咒诅地。

lineList.en: And Lamech lived after he begat Noah five hundred ninety and five years, and begat sons and daughters:
lineList.cn: 拉麦生挪亚之后，又活了五百九十五年，并且生儿养女。

lineList.en: And all the days of Lamech were seven hundred seventy and seven years: and he died.
lineList.cn: 拉麦共活了七百七十七岁就死了。

lineList.en: And Noah was five hundred years old: and Noah begat Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
lineList.cn: 挪亚五百岁生了闪，含，雅弗。
